text:
tOS | react/react native Engineers, Java+Spring Boot Engineers, CTO, CPO, +| Early-Stage | Berlin, Germany| Onsite | - Product: We build a travel B2B plattform - Why us: We are founded by BCG Digital Ventures as well as an amazing corporate partner, which gives us a great unfair advantage to roll over the market - We have a great partner and a strong backing - Stack: Java, react/react native, Spring boot, kubernetis

Start: June '18

Unfortunately at the moment we can't help with visa issues, so people from the EU or with a EU citizenship will be preferred.

Contact: paul@pkrecruiting.de More information: https://tos.workable.com/

- Paul, Recruiting tOS -
